Introduction


Sihyun (시현) is a South Korean actress and singer. She is a former member of the girl group BADKIZ (formely known as HOT PLACE). On October 18, 2018, Sihyun was introduced as a new member of the girl group BADKIZ. On March 29, 2019, she debuted as a member of HOT PLACE with their first digital single album, "Hot Place". She left the group in February 2020.
